headline:
Your AI-powered
calorie tracking companion
description:
Digmio makes nutrition tracking effortless with AI food recognition and barcode scanning.
Track macros, build healthy habits, and reach your goals.

feature_detail.title:
Track your progress with
smart analytics.
feature_detail.description: Get detailed insights into your nutrition journey with weekly charts, macro breakdowns, and streak tracking. Watch your healthy habits grow day by day.

feature_highlight.title: Never wonder "What did I eat today?" again.
feature_highlight.description: AI-powered food recognition identifies your meals instantly. Just snap a photo, and Digmio analyzes the nutritional content for you.

feature_list.title: AI Food Recognition
feature_list.description:
Snap a photo.
Get instant nutrition data.

articles.title: Track your first meal
articles.description: Learn how to log food using AI scanning or barcode scanning.
articles.intro: Tracking meals with Digmio is quick and easy. You can use AI photo recognition, scan barcodes, or enter food manually.

sections.heading: AI Photo Scan
sections.content: Tap the + button and select Take Photo. Point your camera at your meal and take a picture. Digmio's AI will automatically analyze the food and calculate nutritional values.

sections.heading: Barcode Scan
sections.content: For packaged foods, tap Scan Barcode and point your camera at the product barcode. Digmio will instantly retrieve the nutritional information from the database.

sections.heading: Adjust portions
sections.content: After scanning, you can adjust the portion size to match what you actually ate. The nutritional values update automatically based on your portion.

articles.title: Set your daily goals
articles.description: Customize your calorie and macro targets.
articles.intro: Setting the right goals helps you stay on track with your nutrition journey.

sections.heading: Calorie goals
sections.content: Go to Settings ‚Üí Edit Profile to set your daily calorie target. The app calculates a recommended goal based on your age, weight, height, and activity level.

sections.heading: Macro targets
sections.content: Adjust your protein, carbohydrates, and fat targets to match your dietary preferences. Whether you're high-protein, low-carb, or balanced, customize it your way.

sections.heading: Track progress
sections.content: The home screen shows your progress with colorful rings for calories and macros. Watch them fill up as you log meals throughout the day.

articles.title: Understand your dashboard
articles.description: Learn what all the numbers and rings mean.
articles.intro: The home dashboard gives you a complete overview of your daily nutrition at a glance.

sections.heading: Calorie ring
sections.content: The main ring shows your calories consumed vs. your daily target. The flame icon in the center displays remaining calories. Green means you're on track.

sections.heading: Macro breakdown
sections.content: Three smaller rings show protein (red), carbs (orange), and fats (blue). Each displays current grams consumed and your daily goal.

sections.heading: Streak counter
sections.content: The flame streak shows how many consecutive days you've logged food. Tap it to see detailed streak statistics and achievements.

articles.title: How AI food recognition works
articles.description: Learn how Digmio analyzes your meal photos.
articles.intro: Digmio uses advanced AI to identify foods and calculate nutritional values from photos.

sections.heading: What the AI recognizes
sections.content: Digmio's AI can identify:
list: Various cuisines from around the world

sections.heading: How it works
sections.content: When you take a photo, the AI analyzes the image, identifies the food items, estimates portion sizes, and calculates the nutritional content. Results appear in seconds.

articles.title: Tips for better food photos
articles.description: Get more accurate results with these photo tips.
articles.intro: Taking good food photos helps the AI provide more accurate nutritional estimates.

sections.heading: Good lighting
sections.content: Take photos in good lighting conditions. Natural light works best. Make sure the food is clearly visible and not in shadow.

sections.heading: Clear view
sections.content: Position your phone directly above or at a slight angle. Make sure all food items in the meal are visible and not obscured.

sections.heading: Close enough
sections.content: Get close enough that the food fills most of the frame, but not so close that items are cut off. A clear, complete view of the meal works best.

articles.title: Edit logged food
articles.description: Adjust portions or nutritional values for logged meals.
articles.intro: You can edit any logged food entry to ensure accuracy.

sections.heading: Edit from history
sections.content: Tap on any food item in your recent foods list on the home screen. You'll see the full nutrition details and can adjust values.

sections.heading: Adjust portions
sections.content: Change the portion size using the slider or input field. All nutritional values update automatically based on the new portion.

sections.heading: Delete entries
sections.content: Swipe left on any food item in your history to delete it. This is useful if you logged something by mistake.

articles.title: Using the barcode scanner
articles.description: Scan packaged foods for instant nutrition data.
articles.intro: The barcode scanner makes tracking packaged foods incredibly fast and accurate.

sections.heading: How to scan
sections.content: Tap the + button, select Scan Barcode, and point your camera at the product barcode. The app reads the barcode and fetches nutrition data from a comprehensive food database.

sections.heading: Supported barcodes
sections.content: Digmio supports all common barcode formats: EAN-13, UPC-A, Code 128, and more. Works with products from stores worldwide.

sections.heading: Database coverage
sections.content: The database contains millions of products. If a product isn't found, you can add it manually and it will be saved for future use.

articles.title: Understanding scan limits
articles.description: Learn about daily scan limits and Premium features.
articles.intro: Free users get 10 AI food scans per day, while Premium users enjoy unlimited scanning.

sections.heading: Free tier limits
sections.content: Free users can perform 10 AI photo scans per day. The counter resets at midnight. Barcode scanning is always unlimited.

sections.heading: Upgrade to Premium
sections.content: Premium users get unlimited AI food scans, iOS widgets, advanced analytics, and HealthKit sync. Tap Upgrade in settings to learn more.

sections.heading: Check your usage
sections.content: Your current scan count is displayed when you open the camera. The app will notify you when you're close to your daily limit.

articles.title: Add widgets to your Home Screen
articles.description: View your daily nutrition at a glance.
articles.intro: Digmio widgets show your calorie and macro progress right on your Home Screen (Premium feature).

sections.heading: Add a widget
sections.content: Long-press on your Home Screen and tap the + button in the top corner. Search for "Digmio" and choose your preferred widget size. Note: Widgets are a Premium feature.

sections.heading: Widget sizes
sections.content: Digmio offers three widget sizes: Small (calorie ring only), Medium (calories + macros), and Large (complete overview with recent foods and streak).

sections.heading: Auto-updates
sections.content: Widgets automatically update when you log food. Your progress is always current without opening the app.

articles.title: HealthKit integration
articles.description: Sync nutrition data with Apple Health.
articles.intro: Digmio can automatically sync your nutrition data to Apple's HealthKit (Premium feature).

sections.heading: Enable HealthKit sync
sections.content: Go to Settings ‚Üí HealthKit and tap Enable Sync. You'll be asked to grant permissions for nutrition data in the Health app.

sections.heading: What gets synced
sections.content: Digmio syncs calories, protein, carbohydrates, and fats to HealthKit automatically when you log food. Data appears in your Health app immediately.

articles.title: Analytics and insights
articles.intro: The Analytics view shows your nutrition trends and helps you understand your eating patterns.

sections.heading: Weekly charts
sections.content: View your calorie intake over the past week with interactive charts. See which days you hit your goals and which days you went over.

sections.heading: Macro breakdown
sections.content: Analyze your protein, carb, and fat distribution. The pie chart shows percentages to help you balance your nutrition.

sections.heading: Premium analytics
sections.content: Premium users get extended history (monthly and yearly views), advanced comparisons, and detailed trends. Free users see the last 7 days.

articles.title: What's included in Premium
articles.description: Unlock unlimited scans and advanced features.
articles.intro: Digmio Premium removes all limits and unlocks powerful features to supercharge your nutrition tracking.

sections.heading: Unlimited AI scans
sections.content: Free users get 10 AI food scans per day. Premium users get unlimited scans. Track as many meals as you want, whenever you want.

sections.heading: iOS Widgets
sections.content: Add Home Screen widgets in three sizes to see your nutrition progress at a glance. Widgets update automatically as you log food.

sections.heading: Advanced analytics
sections.content: Access extended history with monthly and yearly charts. See long-term trends and patterns in your nutrition. Free users see 7 days only.

sections.heading: HealthKit sync
sections.content: Automatically sync your nutrition data to Apple Health. Your calories and macros appear in the Health app for a complete wellness picture.

articles.title: Subscription plans and pricing
articles.description: Choose the plan that works for you.
articles.intro: Digmio offers flexible subscription options with a free trial to test Premium features.

sections.heading: Free vs Premium
sections.content: The free version includes basic tracking with 10 daily AI scans and barcode scanning. Premium unlocks unlimited scans, widgets, advanced analytics, and HealthKit.

sections.heading: Subscription options
sections.content: Choose monthly or annual billing. Annual subscribers save up to 40% compared to monthly. All subscriptions include a 7-day free trial.

articles.title: Manage your subscription
articles.description: Cancel, restore, or change your Premium plan.
articles.intro: Managing your Digmio subscription is easy through your device settings.

sections.heading: View subscription
sections.content: Go to iPhone Settings ‚Üí [Your Name] ‚Üí Subscriptions to see your Digmio subscription details, renewal date, and pricing.

sections.heading: Cancel anytime
sections.content: You can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have Premium access until the end of your billing period.

sections.heading: Restore purchases
sections.content: If you reinstall the app or switch devices, tap Restore Purchases in Settings to reactivate your Premium subscription.

articles.title: AI recognition seems inaccurate
articles.description: What to do when the AI doesn't recognize food correctly.
articles.intro: While the AI is highly accurate, sometimes it needs help identifying specific foods.

sections.heading: Take better photos
sections.content: Ensure good lighting and a clear view of all food items. The AI works best when it can see the entire meal clearly.

sections.heading: Adjust portions
sections.content: After the AI analyzes your photo, you can manually adjust the portion size to match what you actually ate. Use the slider to fine-tune.

sections.heading: Edit nutrition values
sections.content: Tap on the nutrition card to view and edit individual values. You can adjust calories, protein, carbs, and fats manually if needed.

sections.heading: Use barcode for packaged foods
sections.content: For packaged foods, the barcode scanner provides 100% accurate nutrition data from the product database.

articles.title: Daily scan limit reached
articles.description: What to do when you've used all your free scans.
articles.intro: Free users get 10 AI food scans per day. Here are your options when you reach the limit.

sections.heading: Use barcode scanning
sections.content: Barcode scanning is always unlimited, even for free users. Use it for packaged foods and products with barcodes.

sections.heading: Wait for reset
sections.content: Your scan counter resets at midnight each day. You'll get 10 new scans automatically.

sections.heading: Upgrade to Premium
sections.content: Premium users get unlimited AI food scans with no daily limits. Tap Upgrade to unlock unlimited scanning.

sections.heading: Manual entry
sections.content: You can always log food manually by entering nutrition values yourself. This doesn't count toward your scan limit.

articles.title: App crashes or freezes
articles.description: Steps to resolve app stability issues.
articles.intro: If Digmio is crashing or freezing, try these troubleshooting steps.

sections.heading: Force quit and restart
sections.content: Swipe up from the bottom of your screen (or double-click the home button), then swipe away Digmio. Reopen the app.

sections.heading: Update the app
sections.content: Make sure you have the latest version of Digmio. Open the App Store and check for updates.

sections.heading: Restart your device
sections.content: Sometimes a device restart can fix persistent issues. Turn your iPhone off and back on.

sections.heading: Contact support
sections.content: If the issue persists, contact us at support@digmio.app with details about what happened.

articles.title: Accidentally deleted a food entry
articles.description: How to recover a deleted food log.
articles.intro: Food entries are deleted permanently, but there are ways to recreate them.

sections.heading: Check recent foods
sections.content: If you logged the same food before, it may appear in your recent foods or favorites. You can quickly re-add it from there.

sections.heading: Re-scan if needed
sections.content: For barcoded products, simply scan the barcode again. For photo-based entries, take a new photo of the food.

sections.heading: Manual entry
sections.content: If you remember the nutritional values, you can manually enter them again using the manual entry option.

reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
texts: Since I started using Digmio, I've lost 15 pounds! The AI food recognition makes tracking so effortless.
Finally an app that doesn't feel like work. Highly recommend! üôå

reviews.name: Michael
reviews.text: I've tried every calorie tracking app out there. Digmio is the only one I've actually stuck with. The AI photo feature is incredible - just snap and done!

reviews.title: Best nutrition app!
reviews.text: This app is a revelation. The AI recognizes my food instantly and the barcode scanner is lightning fast. The dark design is gorgeous and widgets are super useful. Worth every penny for Premium!

reviews.name: Fitness Coach Emma
reviews.videoCaption: The easiest way to track macros

reviews.name: David Chen
reviews.text: Digmio's AI is scary accurate. Took a photo of my lunch, it identified everything perfectly. This is the future of nutrition tracking.

reviews.title: Finally, tracking that works
reviews.text: I've been tracking my nutrition for 2 years with various apps. Digmio is by far the easiest and most accurate. The streak feature keeps me motivated every day. Love it!

reviews.name: Lisa Martinez
reviews.text: Down 20 pounds thanks to Digmio! The barcode scanner and AI make tracking actually enjoyable. Never going back to manual entry. üíØ
